titleStmt.title: Eirenokoinonia. The peace of the communion of the Church of England. Or, The conformitie of the ceremonies of the communion of the Church of England with the ensamples and doctrine of the holy Scriptures, and primitiue Church, established by the Apostles of Christ, and the holy martyrs, and bishops, their successors. By Io: Gordon, Doctor of Diuinitie, and Deane of Salisbury.
titleStmt.author: Gordon, John, 1544-1619.

titleStmt.title: Eirenokoinonia. The peace of the communion of the Church of England. Or, The conformitie of the ceremonies of the communion of the Church of England with the ensamples and doctrine of the holy Scriptures, and primitiue Church, established by the Apostles of Christ, and the holy martyrs, and bishops, their successors. By Io: Gordon, Doctor of Diuinitie, and Deane of Salisbury.
titleStmt.author: Gordon, John, 1544-1619.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. S[nodham] for Nathaniell Butter, and are to be solde at the signe of the Pide-Bull, neere S. Austins Gate,

notesStmt.note: First word of title in Greek characters.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
